May 18, 1960
Dr* Gall Adkins, Director
Radio and Television Research
University of Kansas
Lawrence, Kansas
Dear Gall:
I received the enclosed questionnaire from one of your students. Bob
Brooks, with a letter requesting approval of the NAEB of his question*
naire and asking for comments on the questionnaire* I thought it might
be better if I replied to you rather than to Brooks, and then you can
delete any suggestions which you don't like before you pass it on,
since he is your candidate*
In response to his first question, 1 see no reason why the NAEB should
not approve of this* I think Skomia should be contacted for official
approval, but I think that it's a good thing to do* I would suggest
that you ask Skornia if it is all right to indicate that the results
will be distributed to all member stations through the Journal or the
Newsletter* This, too, would increase response*
I have noted my reactions to the questionnaire on the form itself,
wherever thoughts have occurred to me. As I indicated above, you can
throw these out or pass them on, as you see fit* I think that he will
get the most good data out question 7*
Have a good Sumner*
Best,
Samuel L* Becker
Director, Division of
Television-Radio-Film
